title: Node.js creator Ryan Dahl urges Oracle to release JavaScript trademark • DEVCLASS
description: The creator of Node.js and Deno, Ryan Dahl, has penned an open letter to Oracle imploring the company to release the JavaScript trademark into the public domain. “The trademark is a dark cloud looming over the world’s most popular programming language,” he wrote. “Careful law abiding engineers bend over backwards to avoid its use – […]
